## Checklist

- [ ] Title follows Conventional Commits (e.g., feat: add X, fix: handle Y)
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck` passes locally
- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes locally
- [ ] `pnpm build` succeeds locally
- [ ] Tests run locally: `pnpm test -- --run`
- [ ] No secrets committed (checked .env.local, etc.)
